full_threads.body:
Hi team,

Can you please have this new colour added into our website.

1. This new colour on our Premium Marble Range: https://talostone.com.au/premium-marble-range

CALACATTA STATUARIO™ 9050

SPECIFICATIONS

Calacatta Statuario™ 9050

MATERIAL

Mineral Surface

RANGE

Premium Marble Range

NOMINAL SLAB SIZE

3200 × 1600mm

SURFACE FINISH

Matte

NOMINAL SLAB THICKNESS

20mm


Introducing the stunning Calacatta Statuario™ 9050. This elegant and breathtaking mineral surface will transform any design with it's classical sophistication that evokes distinction. The intermingled play between the cool and warm tones makes the Calacatta Statuario™ the perfect choice for a vast range of projects and colour schemes. The expansive grey veining is beautifully balanced with warm, rich details which, combined with the subtle Matte finish, creates a timeless masterpiece that will elevate any design.

WANT TO SEE MORE?
Visit the City Experience Centre, or find your nearest Talostone® showroom. Need any help, please get in touch.






2. Samples on Homeowner: Calacatta Statuario™ 9050
Price should be: $8.00
Please place it "Sample out of stock" for now.

3. Samples on Professional: Calacatta Statuario™ 9050
Price should be: $0.00
Please place it "Sample out of stock" for now.
4. Changes to the collections page: https://talostone.com.au/collections




Best regards,

Tien

Office Manager

Head Office | Mon - Thu

tien@talostone.com.au

02 8783 0600

talostone.com.au
